ygData.msgSnippet: Well, the thing is that everyone has tons of characters, but no one posts for them all. Plus, there are factions that have 60 bots, but only 2 or so members

Well, the thing is that everyone has tons of characters, but no one
posts for them all. Plus, there are factions that have 60 bots, but
only 2 or so members (the NDE is an example of that), and this rule is
trying to eliminate that, along with some other stuff.

Its up to you whether you want to quit or not, of course, but its
pretty childish to do that because you don't like a rule.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "*Orchid*" <ilovealllizards@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Alloran has informed that a new rule in NBW is a limit of 16
characters per member. I have 33 or 34 at the time being. I just can't
part with some of my characters so I probably be parting with this
RPG. I'm still thinking it over but everything points to yes. I may be
unsubscribing tonight but I'm not sure cause I may stay a bit
longer...
